actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 612(b) of title 38, United States Code, to provide any outpatient dental service and treatment to any veteran who has a service-connected disability of 80 percent or more.

summary.text: Authorizes the provision of any outpatient dental service and treatment to any veteran who has a service-connected disability of 80 percent or more. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 612 (b)).

titles.title: A bill to amend section 612(b) of title 38, United States Code, to provide any outpatient dental service and treatment to any veteran who has a service-connected disability of 80 percent or more.
